name: jquery-next-id
description: jQuery collection plugin that will assign the next ID in sequence if an ID property does not already exist.
readme:
# jquery-next-id jQuery collection plugin that will assign the next ID in sequence if an ID property does not already exist. ```js $(collection).nextId([prefix]); ``` ## Defaults ```js $.fn.nextId.defaults = { prefix : 'nid', separator : '-' }; ``` ## Example Input: ```html

*/ with prefix */ $('div').nextId('my-prefix'); */ without prefix */ $('span').nextId(); */ overriding default prefix and separator */ $.fn.nextId.defaults.prefix = 'foo'; $.fn.nextId.defaults.separator = '_'; $('p').nextId(); ``` Output: ```html

``` ## Jenkins CI http://jenkins-5734.lvs01.dev.ebayc3.com:8080/job/jquery-next-id/
